thread:
The Dual-Route Model explains how LLMs use token and concept induction to copy text. 🧠💡 #AIResearch #NLP
 Link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2504.03022
Token induction copies tokens, concept induction copies meaning. 🔍🧠 #AIResearch

Researchers show ablation of token induction heads disrupts literal copying but preserves semantic tasks, while concept induction head ablation harms semantics but not literals. 🧠🔍 #AIResearch #Neuroscience
Drfeifei's new paper shows how induction heads function differently in separate layers, focusing on word ends vs. next tokens. 🧠💡 #NLP #DeepLearning
Researchers reveal LLMs use dual mechanisms for flexible learning. 🧠🤖 #AIResearch #LLMs
